comm: doesn't bother with a sighter as he attacks this fuller length outside of off with a slice over to third man, with this reaching him after a couple of bounces
in the slot and driven competently by MacLeod through extra-cover, as this just gained momentum after he merely pushed at the delivery
length delivery outside of off which is treated with the utmost respect

burst of sun breaks through as he offers up a length delivery slanting on the pads which is eased away with a drive through long on. Looked casual as he struck this, but the pitch did the rest of the work
gets a lovely away swinging delivery on a fuller length outside of off stump. Allowed to breeze through to the keeper
remains watchful outside his off stump to see out this bumper opening over for Scotland
given plenty of flight as he delivers this, with the ball in the air as he defended to the leg side. Manage to run a single as the ball rolls through mid-on
given plenty of air as this is struck away to the off side by the batsman
darts in a quicker one along a similar angle as this is handled competently by MacLeod
defended from within the confines of his crease
gives the charge somewhat before offering a tentative clip through the leg side
defended from the crease as he reaches out to this one sliding in on middle and leg
slants down the leg side on a shortish length as this is glanced away by the batsman

and Mortaza gets a worthy reward as he nips out Calum with this length delivery that catches the leading edge of his bat as he looked to nudge it away to the leg side. Ends up popping over to the fielder inside the ring at cover for a straightforward catch
full delivery on middle and off which is clipped away through mid-on
back of a length and defended towards the off side by Gardiner
glances away this back of a length rolling onto the pads, with the ball ending up near deep fine leg
hangs on the back foot to keep out this back of a length angling in from outside off
whisked away off the pads behind of square as this arrived so slowly to him
another flighted beauty, outside of off, which is diffused of any malice
shuffles in his crease before resorting to the back foot to work away this one drifting in on middle and leg
another flighted wonder which takes an eternity to come as he defends back to the bowler
drags the length onto the pads as he clears his front leg to short-arm pull this over to deep midwicket
whipped away off the back foot through midwicket to keep the strike
is late on this short of a length which clatters into his thigh guard
short of a length and worked away to the leg side by the batsman
looks to drive this away off the back foot through extra-cover, but silly mid-off is having none of it
whisked away at the top of the bounce behind of square to pickup a brace
tries to cut through cover point now, but doesn't quite time it away off the blade
delivers a fuller length outside of off which Gardiner has a drive at as the ball just nibbles away on the way to the keeper
darts a quicker one in which strikes the pads, but going down, as Gardiner is late on it
tries to nurdle a single through the leg side, but is thwarted by the close-in field
did not look at all confident with this attempted paddle sweep, looking to go initially through backward square
finally succeeds in getting a single on the leg side to bring Coetzer on strike
driven rather tentatively towards the fielder at cover
clipped away to the leg side to bring the over to an end
length delivery on middle and off which he gets a slight inside-edge to as he played at it
short of a length, just outside of off, as this is fended away by the batsman
tries to carve away some runs through the covers, but is stopped by the fielder on the ring
guilty of bowling a bit too short as Gardiner rocks back to pull this authoritatively through midwicket for a boundary
seemed to put a lot more force behind this fuller one outside off, as this shapes away naturally upon pitching
employs a traditional front foot defense to see out this fuller delivery angling in outside off
begins with a fuller length outside of off which is dabbed away square to third man
keeps out this fuller one barreling in on off stump
gets appreciable movement into the batsman, and consequently, down the leg side as this is worked away with the angle through backward square
has a push at this fullish length outside his off peg, with the short mid-off fielder getting his body soundly behind the ball
sharp bouncer just outside off which cramps Coetzer for space as he lets go of one hand from the handle as he glided this away through third man
pacey delivery on the pads which Mushfiqur has to stretch fully to his left to get a paw on. Ends up doing the deed, saving Bangladesh a potential leg-side boundary. His father would be proud
length delivery which is negotiated with ease by Gardiner
shortish length which shapes away as the batsman defended at the top of the bounce
short from Rubel and Hamish is able to pull this easily through midwicket to find yet another boundary
looks to nail one through the covers, but doesn't quite get it away as such

straying down the pads on a fullish length as Hamish, who just manages to get an edge on this as he went for the flick, is able to pickup a boundary through fine leg after Mushfiqur fails to take the chance from behind. His father will not be so proud.
keeps out this fuller delivery on and around off to see out his first over
punched away through the covers, but is stopped by a fine, diving save. This one by Sarkar, who does well to get low to his right
has a waft at this back of a length outside off, with the ball doing just enough to flash by the moving blade
short of a length delivery into the ribs which is glanced away fine behind of square
decides to let this short of a length outside of off sail through to Mushfiqur

Taskin exults in pure joy as he succeeds in getting Gardiner to slash at this back of a length outside of off, with this landing straight to the man at cover, who is able to take it on the second attempt after bobbling the initial take
short of a length which climbs at an awkward height as he fends this away behind of square through long leg
defended away to the leg side by the batsman
another one which is fended away leg-side
flights one in on middle and leg which is defended from the crease
comes down the track before heaving Mahmudullah high over cow corner for a smooth six into the stands. Just effortless as this sailed away
punches the bowler through the covers now in hopes of piercing the gap
defends this one drifted in back to the bowler in his follow through
driven away off the back foot to this one shaping in from outside off. Stopped by the mid-on fielder
whips away this back of a length honing on the pads behind to deep fine leg
strikes the pads but it looks like this may have pitched outside of leg as Mashrafe comes up to flirt with the prospect of getting this one reviewed
defends this shortish length back towards the bowler, but with soft hands
slanting down the pads as this is whipped away to square-leg
overpitched just outside of off, but nailed straight to the short mid-off fielder
goes round the wicket as he lobs up one on middle and leg which is dispatched to the man at deep midwicket
drifts onto the pads as this is nudged away through the leg side
eased away to the close-in fielder on the leg side as he stays within the crease

short now as he picks his spot at backward square to pummel this one slipping away down leg. Bruce Oxenford, who turned 55 today, is lucky that he will live to see his 56th after almost getting decapitated with that blow
picks up a single through deep square-leg, with the leg umpire twitching as he sees another flash of white coming his way
worked away to the leg side to end a rather eventful over, but not for the batsmen or bowler really. Someone check on Oxenford's ticker?
full delivery slanting down leg and signalled wide as Kyle fails to get any bat on it
short of a length outside of off which is cut away to deep point
short delivery which is hooked away through backward square to find the boundary in a hurry
short of length on off. Machan punches it back to the bowler
angled across the left-hander. Machan steers it to third man with an angled bat
drops another shortish length, this time heading down the leg side, as he just about gets bat on bat to tickle this past Mushfiqur to the fine leg boundary
poor delivery to end the over. Taskin errs in line, drifts onto the pads, Coetzer tickles it fine and beats a desperate dive from Rahim behind the stumps
eased away through long on for a comfortable single
flighted on middle as this is nurdled back towards the bowler
fails to whip away this delivery on the leg stump
defended away towards long on for another single
steers this one drifting in down to the man at long on
flighted on middle and off as Machan advances a few steps before defending away to the leg side
full delivery outside of off which Kyle looks to give the beans, but is late on as this continues behind to the keeper
a touch closer on a similar length now as this is caressed away to the extra-cover fielder
elegant from Machan as he gets a half-volley outside off before unfurling a corker of a drive to find the extra-cover boundary in a flash
defended from the crease to this back of a length from Rubel
pushes at this fuller one angling in from leg, as this is worked down to mid-off
short from Rubel and pulled away through midwicket for a couple
continues from round the wicket as this flighted delivery is struck back to him in his follow through
this time is able to guide it past the bowler to long off
punched away to the man on the ring at mid-off
driven off the back foot, but straight to the bowler
this time glances the bowler through square leg, but the close-in fielder on that side quickly dissuades the notion of a quick single
comes down the track before being intercepted by Nasir at short mid-on, who pounces on to it
defended away on the front foot to this one drifting in
able to sweep the bowler square off the wicket on the leg side for one
cuts away this slightly short delivery outside of off, but some really excellent fielding, from Nasir again, at extra-cover is able to stop this
looks to go for the reverse now but is struck on and around leg, with the trajectory suggesting it would continue down that angle
defended away to the leg side by the batsman
once more tries to reverse sweep as he is slightly late on this one, before having to recover and knock away the ball after seeing it fall dangerously close to the base of his stumps
gets a fortunate boundary through third man as this short of a length catches the outside of his bat as he looked to punch through the covers
goes after this short of a length outside off, but is late on it
fuller delivery which is driven straight to short mid-off
looking to force one away through the covers, but ends up mishitting more towards mid-on
fuller delivery on the pads which is whipped away through to deep midwicket
dabs this just back of a length delivery down to third man to end the over
advances a touch before guiding this Shakib delivery down to long on
waits on this floated delivery outside off before heaving it over deep midwicket for a boundary. Well calculated risk that comes off to a tee
given plenty of air outside of off as Coetzer tries to club this away through the covers
Shakib succeeds in getting Coetzer to attack this flighted delivery, as he chips at this one uppishly between the midwicket and mid-on fielders to find the cow corner boundary
gets a nice stride in before smothering for the spin
tries to nurdle a single down the leg side, but is held by the close-in fielder
slow bouncer which Bangladesh go up for thinking Machan may have feathered an edge as he tried to remove his bat from the equation. Called a wide in the end
gets away with this uppish clip through backward square, with this falling safe in the end
carves away a single with a slap through the covers
short of a length which he fails to run down through third man
safely negotiates this fuller length going across
fullish length which is driven away through extra-cover for a couple, but they really should have made this three
driven straight to mid-off to end the over
gets on one knee before sweeping powerfully to deep backward square. That also raises their 100, with polite applause, and bagpipes, going off at the ground
clips away this fuller one on the pads through midwicket
punched away through the covers, but short mid-off is like "oh, hell no"
this time eased away through long on for one
tries to force one away through the leg side, but picks out the close-in fielder
driven firmly down to long on to end another good over for Scotland as they tick on through
fuller delivery which is driven down to long off
carves away a single through cover to get Coetzer on strike
short delivery outside of off which just sits up for Coetzer as he pulls this authoritatively through cow corner to get four more
slaps away this length delivery to sweeper cover to get to the other end
goes for the drop single outside his off stump, which he executes with aplomb
gets an inside edge to this attempted clip through midwicket, with some initial interest from the Bangladeshi ranks
able to get away a clip through to deep midwicket as he returns for the second
another push off the pads down to the man in the deep, this time for one
given plenty of rip as this is glided down through third man
this time whipped away off the back foot down to long on
tossed up as this is lasered down to deep extra-cover, with some nifty footwork on the boundary edge keeping this to under four
and the leggie has proven trumps for Mashrafe as he claims his first ODI wicket after Machan ends up playing this one straight back to the bowler in his follow through, who takes a simple chance
safely negotiates this length delivery outside off, even getting a run out of it after seeing the lax approach from the close-in fielders
fuller length which is fended away by the Scottish captain
length delivery which shapes in as he remains resolute outside off stump
opts for the late cut behind backward point to find the fielder in the deep at third man
whips away this back of a length through mid-on, but not anywhere where a run can be earned

goes for the aerial slice through third man as this flies past backward point. Looks like it will be picked up by third man in the deep, but he ends up making a hash of it to allow it through for four. Earns Coetzer his fifty
flighted outside of off as this is drilled straight to point
defended by the batsman to the off side
pokes at this one drifting in on middle and leg, stealing a single as he pushed it away to the off side
given air outside of off as this is lasered straight to long off
guides this one past the bowler to find long on
turned away off the pads towards mid-on to end the over
looks to attack this short of a length but is late on it as he went with the pull
back of a length outside off which shapes away as he has another flash
almost a carbon copy of the previous delivery, with this perhaps a touch wider from the batsman
short of a length which is pushed away towards the off side for a quick single
driven away now through backward point to get to the other end
drives this fuller one back to the bowler in his follow through
clatters this dragged length from Sabbir through extra-cover to pickup a boundary
steered to the right of the bowler as he picks up a single through long on
advances down the track before blitzing this straight to long on. Doesn't prevent them from eking out a single in the process
driven inside-out through long off as they settle for just the one
forced away through the covers for a rather straightforward single
finishes with a single through long off
full delivery which is far too fast for Coetzer as he tried to angle this away through third man
in the slot but all Coetzer can do is caress this straight to short cover
back of a length and sits up for Coetzer as he belts this through the line to get away a boundary through cow corner
driven away on the front foot towards the off side
forces away a bludgeon through long off which lands to the fielder in the deep after a couple of bounces
tucks away this back of a length slanting on the pads
greets Taskin with a slap to this back of a length delivery through extra-cover as this races away to the boundary
slices away the bowler aerially to a squarish third man
drifting on the pads now as this is flicked behind to deep fine leg
slower delivery, outside of off, which is picked early as he laces this through the covers to the man in the deep
slower delivery outside of off which is handled with ease by the batsman
short of a length, just outside off, as he ramps this over third man to find a useful boundary to end the over
eases away the single to the leg side for one
fetches this one drifting on middle and off and paddles it over fine leg to pick the gap, with the fielder at short backward square doing well to stop this before the boundary
drags this one on leg stump, but misses out as he hammers this one away straight to deep square-leg
another loose delivery down the leg side which Coetzer is able to manipulate away through long leg as he changes his stance to pull this away in that general direction
this time tries to force it past the bowler, but is stopped in his tracks

another poor delivery from Mahmudullah as Mommsen pulls this one hard to long leg, with the fielder doing well to dive to get to this, but he may have dislocated his right shoulder in the process as he looks to be in a world of pain at the moment. The physio is rushing to his side as he goes down in agony
driven back to the bowler in his follow through
a touch short as this one is drilled straight to mid-off

leg-side slanting delivery which is helped with the angle as he deposits this one past backward square to the boundary. Moves him to the top of Scotland's all-time individual score list in World Cups. Passed Gavin Hamilton's effort of 76 from 1999
quicker delivery on off, Coetzer pushes it back to the bowler
flighted delivery from Rahman, Coetzer defends it
tossed up outside off, Coetzer drives it to long off and he will keep the strike
fuller delivery outside of off which is driven to the man at cover
blazes away a drive on the up through the covers to find four runs
slower bouncer which Coetzer was looking to hammer through midwicket, before readjusting at the last moment to whack this down past backward point
looks to go aerially over the covers but ends up slicing away to third man, with the fielder doing enough to get on to this
low, full toss just outside off which is drilled straight to the bowler in his follow through
slower delivery which is helped down to deep fine leg
gets nicely behind the line to cover for any turn
looks to force the issue through the covers, but doesn't quite time it away
this time is able to get away with the drive square off the wicket, as point's fumble allows them through in the end
waltzes down before working this away to long on
tries to pick the gap through mid-on, but is thwarted in his attempt
whipped away off the pads down to deep midwicket to keep the strike
just fends this one floated in from outside off towards the man at cover
this time driven away through towards cover, with a run on offer with all the space, but they elect not to take it
this time works away a single down the leg side
safely negotiated by Mommsen off the back foot as he tried to force the issue
defended by the batsman to the right of Nasir in his follow through
eased away a run through square-leg to keep the strike
dabs away this length delivery outside of off to third man
slaps away a single square off the wicket with no issue
clears the cow corner boundary with ease as he heaves Mashrafe, who ends up bowling a no ball, over the area with comfortable ease
is unable to do justice to this fuller one as he slices inside-out over the cover region
lovely lofted stroke, now over extra-cover, as Coetzer gets into the act, moving him to 94 in the process. Will be looked upon as the anchor while Mommsen looks to blast around him
laces this fuller length straight to the extra-cover fielder on the ring
fails to get away this back foot punch past the bowler, who is able to stop this in his bowling stride
floated on off as this is drilled straight to deep extra-cover
helps this one slipping down the leg side through fine leg as the pair are restricted to just the two
defended from the relative safety of his crease
looking to go through the covers but ends up hitting it a lot straighter to Shakib
once again succeeds in finding the bowler in his follow through
this time attacks through long off to pickup a single
clubs away this back of a length through long off, but can't eke out the single
is late on this back of a length outside of off which sails through comfortably to Mushfiqur
has a another wild swing to this length delivery outside his off stump

fetches this length delivery outside of off before slamming this high over long on to bring up Scotland's first World Cup century. Outstanding way to get to a treasured landmark. Yet another significant victory for the Associates as they continue to make a strong case at this World Cup
stand and deliver as he pummels this fuller one in the general direction of long on
once again targets the long on area, timing away a drive which is intercepted by the mid-on fielder
goes down a touch before chipping this one in the direction of long off
eased away through the same region as they rotate the strike
fetches this one outside of off before sweeping away powerfully through midwicket
able to dig out this quicker one darted in on leg
uses his feet well to chip this one down to long on for one
picks up a single through long off now to keep the strike
just stands his ground before drilling this fuller delivery outside off through the covers
slightly full again and punished by Coetzer as he goes aerial through long off now to find four more
tries to pickup this fuller length on the pads but is late on it
picks up a brace with a swat down the ground
crunch! Coetzer sends this fuller delivery high over long off as another half a dozen is signalled by the umpire
ducks under this shorter one from Rubel, which is deemed wide by the square-leg umpire
now works away a single through long off to keep the strike and end a successful Powerplay for Scotland, one in which they gained 50 runs
safely negotiates this flighted delivery on middle and off
floated up on middle and leg as this is clipped towards mid-on
driven on the up through long off to get to the other end
glances away this leg-side delivery as they hustle the first one to come back just in the nick of time for the second, despite being under pressure from the throw at midwicket
pushes out at this one drifting in, finding some space near mid-off
turned away towards mid-on as they scamper a quick single, which they complete despite a shy at the non-striker's
dishes a low, full toss which he is lucky to get away with as this is struck firmly to the cover fielder
full outside of off as he just about gets away a slice through the region to pickup four runs
picks his spot at long off, and fulfills it with a slap to this full toss which arrives just about waist-height
full, and just wide of a groping Coetzer as he looked to throw the kitchen sink at it
waits and waits before distintegrating the leather of this one, getting this high over long on for a huge six. Coetzer moves to 140 now. Outstanding stuff!
fires in a yorker on leg which is dug out in the end by Coetzer as he angles it away through midwicket. Also gets Scotland to 250 as well, much to the delight of the Saxton faithful
just flicks away this one darted in on the pads, just in front of square on the leg side
turns away this one flighted in on middle and off, as a misfield at mid-on allows them some extra runs
this time nudged away to square-leg, as they hustle through the first to come back in time for the second
floated up on off as this is eased down to long off

Mommsen, looking to up the ante with a boundary hit near the end of the over, but ends up holing out at deep midwicket once the man at cow corner comes forward to claim the catch. Didn't quite get this away off the bat, but he has played a superb hand to lend support to this Coetzer classic
able to keep the strike as he tucks away a single through midwicket
moves to 150 with this slap down to long off. This is the first time an Associate batsman has scored 150 in a World Cup game
flat-bats this one darted in outside off to get the man back on strike
Coetzer continues to motor along as he paddle-sweeps this leg-side delivery over to the square-leg boundary
this time quicker in the air as this is defended away to the off side

comes down a touch to try and force away a drive through the covers. Berrington wants the run so Coetzer takes the lead, with the bowler having to do a turn to fire in a throw after picking up the ball, but misses the non-striker's stumps
Berrington now eases away a single down to long on to finish the over
sweeps away this one flighted in on middle and leg, getting this down to deep backward square in the end
another leg-side delivery which is helped with the angle, but is stopped by short backward square
backs away to the leg side before clubbing this shorter length over to deep square-leg

and Coetzer's day out at the Saxton comes to a close as he attempts yet another heave over cow corner, but falls short of the mark as this lands at deep midwicket for a straightforward take. Exits the oval to very generous applause as he has put together the innings of his life to give Scotland a serious shot at winning this match
gets away a powerful sweep through backward square as the pair settle for just the one
ends up hitting this one back to the bowler in his follow through

poor running from these two, it was a short delivery from Rahman, Berrington hangs back and pulls it behind square, the fielder from deep square leg runs to his right, slides and saves three for his team
gets away a single square off the wicket now
wonderful sound as he connected with this wristy flick over midwicket, with this sailing high and handsome onto the roof!
clatters away a single through the covers, much to the relief of Sabbir whose head must still be spinning after that last strike
able to squirt away a brace through to deep extra-cover, with a diving save near the boundary edge cutting off any extra runs

was looking to get away a blow over midwicket, but ends up hitting it more towards long leg after swiveling more than he would have liked. Is cut off in the end, but just mere inches from the boundary rope
almost succeeds in bowling himself as he fails at this reverse sweep, with the ball just rushing past the off stump
monstrous hit from Berrington, now over extra-cover, as he backed away a touch before slicing this high and mighty over the region. Berrington looking to play a blinder here in Nelson
backs away to the leg side before directing away this one which follows him to the man at deep midwicket
now looks to scythe through the covers, but is stopped by the fielder inside of the ring
once again creates room before slapping away this shorter length from Nasir through extra-cover, with this having just enough on it to beat the boot of long off who was coming round to field it
needles away a single down to long on to end the over
dishes up a wide full toss which is slapped straight to extra-cover at a rate of knots
fetches this full toss outside of off and deposits it high over long leg with a wristy flick to get Scotland past 300
given plenty of air as Cross is late on the cross-batted swat through long on
flighted up, on a fuller length, as Cross is unable to get this away
bit quicker now as Cross bludgeons through the off side, running hard to get Berrington back on the Hot Seat
slows down the pace of this one outside off as Berrington is far too early into the sweep through midwicket

dropped this attempted heave over long on just falls short of the fielder as he ran full tilt to try and get at this one which was dying quickly on him, but ends up bobbling the chance once he went to ground
slow, wide delivery outside of off which Berrington initially looked to attack, before letting it through in hopes of the delivery getting penalised

slams this low full toss straight at the non-striker's left hand, who drops the bat, which was in that hand. Looks to be in some trouble as that was a stinger of a blow. That really had to hurt as he gave that one plenty of welly.

slower, full delivery outside of off which Berrington ends up mishitting high in the air as the bat turned in his hands. Mushfiqur, running back and to his left, is able in the end to complete the chance after the ball swirled in the dying moments. Mushfiqur's father, who is still out there in the stands I am sure, would be proud
reaches out to this widish, full delivery, but because his stance was so off-side, he is not penalised by the umpire

goes for the big tonk through long off, but ends up giving up a thick outside edge which flies dangerously close to the outstretched glove of Mushfiqur, who is unable to get to it. His father, would not be so proud
slower ball outside off which is slapped straight to cover point, who takes it at head height quite comfortably. Taskin has come back really well for Bangladesh here in this over
driven with ease down to long off
able to tuck away this one on middle and leg to the leg side
carves out a single to this one floated in outside off
backs away a whole lot before driving this to the close-in fielder on the off side

unbelievable catch in the deep at square-leg as Haq looks for quick runs over midwicket, but Soumya, who has already taken a couple today, comes forward before putting in a fine, forward dive to pluck this just inches from the ground. Fantastic catch, but far too late in the grand scheme of things
looks for the reverse sweep to this one flighted in outside off, but is late on it. Doesn't really matter though as it is called wide in the end

some great hustle from both these batsmen are able to take Scotland to a rather imposing 318 for 8. Works this one away through long off, running the first one hard in order to come back in time of the throw for the second
begins with some short stuff on middle which Tamim is content to duck under
gets the line horribly wrong as he splashes down leg
full delivery which is driven towards the general direction of mid-off
gets in a nice stride to defend this fuller one going across, with a hint of swing into him as he presented the bat
overpitched from Wardlaw as this is driven competently through long off for a couple
elects to leave this slightly back of a length outside of off
shoulders arms to this slightly back of a length delivery going across him
punches this back of a length towards deep extra-cover as they are able to complete a coupl e
looks to caress this shortish length through the covers, but is stopped by the fielder in question
looking for the appeal as this one strikes the pads on a leg-stump line. Umpire remains nonplussed though, with the angle suggesting this was missing the leg stump
driven down to mid-on now as they look to be watchful in these early exchanges

definite sound off the bat as he offers up a faint tickle to this shorter one he tried to help down fine leg, with the keeper going straight up for it as soon as he completed the take. The bowler knows as well, and the umpire raises the dreaded finger as Bangaldesh are 5 for 1 early in the piece.
gets this one completely wrong as he fires down the leg side
defends this length delivery to the off side to end the over
gets in a stride to try and blitz this through long off, but ends up mishitting more to midwicket, with the ball stopped soon after inside of the ring
just about gets his bat out of the way to this shorter one going across, despite getting hit on the glove as this bounces down towards the keeper behind
pulls away this shorter one which sits up at a comfortable height as this goes all the way to the square-leg boundary
another short delivery which is punished by the batsman as this time he is able to manipulate the ball through long leg
this time searching for the gap at midwicket, but picks out the fielder
strikes him on the pads, but the inward angle suggests this was missing leg stump quite comfortably, despite the interested shout
fuller length which he ends up inside-edging onto the pads
length delivery, shaping away greatly outside off, as the umpire gets an excuse to stretch
cut away through the gap at cover point to pickup a brace as this is tracked back before the boundary
dabs this one outside off to the fielder at third man

full delivery drifting on the pads as this is flicked behind through fine leg to pickup an easy boundary. Really loose from Davey, who is currently second on the 2015 World Cup wicket-takers' list with eleven scalps
this time goes aerially with a slice through third man, but this one ends up falling short of the fielder in the deep
runs this one outside off just past backward point to steal a single
brings the bat down to dig out this full delivery just outside off
simply opens the face to glide this length delivery down to third man, with the fielder putting in a useful dive to try and cut off some extra runs on the boundary edge, but fails to do so
this time tucked away to the leg side, but times it a bit too well to the close-in fielder
straying on the pads, on a fuller length, as this is glanced behind of square on the leg side
full delivery on middle and leg which is steered down to mid-on
punched away at the top of the bounce towards the covers, with the fielder in question doing well to get his body behind the ball
and he is greeted with a hard slap through cover to find a boundary
this time looks to get past the square-leg, but locates him with a neat flick off the pads

width on offer as Mahmudullah goes hard once more, this time over backward point with a shot into the ground before bouncing over the fielder, but is reined in by the boundary rider at a squarish third man
picks his spot at deep midwicket to get away a clip which just about manages to have enough legs on it to reach the rope
solid in defense as this one nipped in upon pitching outside of off
gets away with a French cut through fine leg as he retains the strike
bangs in a shorter one which is pulled rather haphazardly through midwicket
full, outside of off, as he leans into a drive towards extra-cover before setting off for the tight single
defends this back of a length softly to the leg side
mishits this attempt drive through long off as the ball ends up somewhere near midwicket
turns away this slightly back of a length, but finds the man at square-leg, who is quite inside the circle

Tamim continues to ride his luck as he gets away this rather rash hook over long leg, with this just having enough to sail over the fielder waiting in the deep. Just flew over his finger tips as he strained to reach for it. He did have a couple of feet to work with behind him, so perhaps he could have got a bit deeper to compensate for the dip
punches this length delivery outside of off straight to silly mid-on
slips in a fuller delivery which is struck back to him as he just gets his foot out to stop this one from going past
defended off the back foot to this short of a length outside off
tries to angle one away through midwicket, but picks out the close-in fielder on the leg side
gets in a good stride before looking to work the bowler past backward point, but ends up finding the fielder
tries to pick the gap through the cover region, but fails to do so
and he almost added to his tally as Tamim attacked this back of a length outside off, chipping this just past the man at extra-cover. Fifty up for Bangladesh
fires one in the slot and Tamim obliges as he lasers this cover drive to find the boundary in no time
shoulders arms to this fuller length going across him
slips in a fuller delivery on middle and leg. This one is defended away towards mid-on
this time defended away on the off side by the batsman
backs away a touch as the bowler, who saw the initial movement, drags the length, but this doesn't deter Tamim from clubbing this back over through long off in an attempt to pickup a boundary
looks to go hard square off the wicket on the off side, but picks out point
short of a length outside of off which is run down towards the third man region

Bangladesh playing some risky cricket as this slap from Mahmudullah is stopped by the man on the ring at cover, before some hesitation by the two batsmen affords him precious seconds to pickup and fire in a throw at the non-striker's, which has Mahmudullah haring to that end as he dives forward to just make his ground before the throw
driven firmly towards mid-off, but no one where he could run the single
mishits this attempted drive through long off, with this stopped by the silly mid-on fielder
fires in a full, wide delivery which Tamim places expertly through extra-cover to bring up his fifth boundary
gets forward to this length delivery just outside off stump
gets away a rather streaky clip through backward square, with the pair scampering a single
just about digs out this fuller one on middle and off
delivers a jaffa, on a middle to off-stump line, as Tamim plays just inside of the line as this nipped away upon pitching
able to hook the fast bowler through fine leg to get to the other end
strays down the leg side as Mahmudullah fails to get away the clip behind square
safely negotiates this length delivery outside of off to end the over
pushes at this length delivery through the cover point region as they are able to steal a single
Mahmudullah gives Evans the charge as he hammers this shorter one high over backward square to pickup a 70m six
sensibly looks to guide one past a packed cover region, but is unavailable to get this past the fielder
back of a length and tucked away by Mahmudullah to the leg side
goes round the wicket to Tamim as he fires in a full, delivery, with some width on offer, as Tamim drills this towards deep cover
length delivery which just sits up for Mahmudullah as he is able to pull this away handsomely through cow corner for four
needles a single through cover to get off strike
is late on this attempted flash through point as the ball swings away upon pitching
delivery slanting on the pads as this is glanced behind to deep square-leg
full and going across as Tamim uncorks a classic cover drive. Trademark shot from Tamim, who looked quite stylish as he pulled off the shot
slower, short of a length, which is handled with aplomb by Tamim
far too wide, and full, as this time Tamim goes a bit squarer to find the boundary rider near deep extra-cover
gets a good stride to smother the spin of this one floated outside of off from round the wicket
attacks the ball this time as he picks out the man at deep cover
spins one back into him as this is flicked away to midwicket
too straight and a little shorter as well, flicked to deep backward square leg
looks to tuck away the bowler on the leg side, but picks out the man at square-leg
steered away towards extra-cover to end Machan's opening over

given plenty of flight as Mahmudullah almost causes a colossal mishap as he backs up far too much after Tamim turns this away to the leg side. Tamim immediately sends him back, but not before Mahmudullah had made it over three-quarters of the way. Is able to just get back as the throw fired in ends up hitting his leg as he went for the dive to make his ground
defended comfortably by the batsman
comes down the track to this floater on and around off, working this one away in the end to long off
looks to nurdle the bowler on the leg side as he played with soft hands
steers this one now through midwicket to get to the other end
advances down before adjusting his stroke to push at this one softly to the off side before running down to the other end
looks to nudge away a single through midwicket, but no can do
drags the length a touch as Tamim gets away with an outside edge through third man
guides this next one down to long on for a straightforward single
gets this fine with a paddle down the leg side as they are able to return for the second
tries to force away the ball on the off side, but ends up hitting it more towards midwicket
short enough for him to get back and glance this away just behind square
waltzes down before checking his stroke to get this away just behind square with a flick
delays as he floats this one outside off, with this worked away to the off side by Tamim
slipping down the leg side as the attempted clip fails to make a connection
spinning away outside off stump, defended into the off side
driven straight back to the bowler, who puts in a fine, diving stop to his right
shuffles away a run on the leg side as he reaches fifty. Bangladesh will need him to stick around and deliver as they look to complete this 300+ chase
takes a couple of steps down before defending the delivery from the spinner
steered away through long off to get Mahmudullah on strike
crouches forward before angling away this delivery square off the wicket on the leg side
eased away off the back foot to find deep square-leg
gets in a stride before glancing away this leg-side slanting delivery to backward square
works with the angle to paddle this one round the corner to deep fine leg
finishes off the over with a drive down to long off as drinks are called onto the field
steps out and defends this flighted delivery to short cover as he doesn't get to the pitch of the ball
on the off stump as this is flicked away by Tamim to midwicket
tossed up just outside off stump, Mahmudullah turns it to deep square leg
full and outside off stump, Tamim works it to midwicket
turning back in as Mahmudullah works it to square-leg
picks up a single down at deep cover as they continue to rotate the strike
full on middle and leg as this is eased down to long on
comes down the track as the bowler follows him with a leg-side slanting delivery that cramps him for room as he ends up hitting this in the general direction of the bowler
length delivery outside off which he gives the beans to as this is sent racing away through extra-cover for a boundary
full and angling in with the round-the-wicket angle as this is drilled just past the bowler to long off
short of a length outside off which is clattered away to deep extra-cover

slower ball outside off which is edged away through third man, with Majid Haq, who puts in a diving stop just before the boundary as he may have just made contact with the boundary rope as he fielded the ball. Unlucky for Majid as he did his best there. Mahmudullah gets his half-century in the process as well
flights one in on middle as this is defended carefully by Tamim
digs out this fuller one darted in as the ball ends up at long on
defends this one on the front foot, and with soft hands
steers this past a diving Majid to pick out the man at long on
goes for the tap-and-run outside his off stump, which they execute to perfection
tries to force this past backward point with a late cut, but ends up finding the fielder all the same
majestic drive on the up through extra-cover as Tamim looks very comfortable out there. Classic stroke that just raced away to the rope
content to work one away on the leg side now to get off strike
looking to steer one down to long on, which he does, but a bit too well then he would have liked as they are unable to take the run
length delivery outside off which nips in a bit, as Mahmudullah fends away to the off side
short of a length and whipped away off the pads to backward square
just about gets away the glide past backward point to keep the strike
eases away Haq through long on to get to the other end

straddling on the leg stump as Majid ends up pulling a Finn after disturbing the bails at the non-striker's end in his delivery stride. Won't be a free hit though, as Tamim and Mahmudullah inquire earnestly
picks up a single with a good ole tap-and-run outside off
picks out a single on the off side
defended with soft hands on the off side as the close-in fielders hunt the ball down to try and dissuade another tight single
this time gets it away just behind square on the leg side

tucks away this leg-side slanting delivery, with the batsmen setting off for a quick single. Tamim, who was running to the danger end, is able to ground his bat before the direct throw from the fielder. Repays confirm that he was in by yards.
although he won't be too pleased with this first effort as Mahmudullah is able to run this length delivery past the boundary rider at third man to get four
slips in a fuller one on middle and leg which is dug out by the batsman

you simply can't get unluckier than this. Mahmudullah has to limp off from the Saxton after getting struck full on the toe as he backed away to try and create room on the off side. The bowler saw it early enough to follow him with the delivery, with this going off the toe and then going on strike the base of the stumps right after. The angle would have suggested this was going further down leg, but such was the freak nature of this ricochet. Really, really unlucky for Mahmudullah as he nurses what could be a broken left toe. A real sandshoe crusher
gives Mushfiqur the best possible start as he offers a full toss on the pads which is clipped away quickly to the square-leg boundary
provides a helmet check to Mushfiqur as he just about manages to avoid any more harm
cut away now at the top of the bounce to pickup a brace square off the wicket
defended away on the off side by Tamim
shows his finesse outside off stump as he waits and waits before just opening the face to get this away to the boundary
gets in a good stride to smother for any possible turn
given plenty of rip as this is defended back to the man at short mid-off
picks out the vacant space near point as they are able to exchange ends
turns this one away just behind of square, but is unable to do more than that
another hesitant call from these two, as Mushfiqur, seeing Tamim come down after placing this somewhere near point, sends his partner back when he sees the close-in fielders racing to the ball
hooks away this shorter delivery to the man at deep fine leg
chases after this short delivery outside off as he ramps over backward point to find the boundary
helped away on the leg side now as the pair complete a run
clips away this fuller delivery going down the leg side as they are able to complete two before the throw from the deep
eases away a comfortable single through midwicket to end the over
has a go at this fuller delivery which shapes away upon pitching as it went across
tries to caress away a run through backward point, but is held by the fielder
gets away a thick outside edge to this attempted flash over the covers, with the man at third man running full tilt to intercept this on the bounce, which he does mighty well in the end
length on the pads which is tucked away by Mushfiqur to the leg side
waits on this before running it down to third man for a single
short of a length which is helped down to deep backward square
scythes away the bowler through the covers as this has just enough on it to beat a despairing dive from sweeper cover to the boundary
eases away a single now through long on to get off the strike
flicks away this fuller one darted in on the pads, but straight to square-leg
in the slot for Tamim to drive through extra-cover, which he does competently enough, but can't get it past the boundary rider stationed near there in the deep
carefully defends this one outside off with soft hands

Tamim becomes the highest individual scorer for Bangladesh in a World Cup match with a cover drive that puts him up at 88, beating Mohammed Ashraful's mark of 87 against South Africa in that famous victory for Bangladesh in the 2007 edition
driven firmly down to long off as they pickup yet another single
safely negotiates this fuller delivery outside of off as Evans picks up the ball
length delivery slipping down the pads as this is tickled away through fine leg, with the boundary rider doing well to cut this off
short of a length and defended at the top of the bounce by Mushfiqur, who really had to get high on his tippy-toes
length just outside off which is driven towards the fielder at short mid-off
short enough for Mushfiqur to get under, which is probably not saying much, as he ends up getting away a pull through cow corner
tries to steer this one past Machan, who puts in a fine, diving stop in the end
defended back to the bowler from the relative safety of his batting crease
glanced away square off the wicket to move into the 90s
gets on one knee to send this orbiting over Nelson, before descending back into the stands at midwicket
looking to complete two as he gets away a push through the covers
steered comfortably past a sprawling mid-on to locate long on
and he makes further inroads into the deficit as he sends this Majid special over long off after a couple of skips down the track
this time looks to attack square off the wicket with a fierce cut, but the fielder at point is more than equal to the task as he leaps onto the ball to stop it dead in its tracks
picks up a single down square-leg
flicks his wrists to this one drifted in just outside off as the fielder, who was chasing after it, is able to rein it in before the third man boundary
gets nice and low to defend this one floated in on off
shimmies down but is unable to do any better but knock this back rather feebly to the bowler
tries to force away a drive through the covers, but is stopped by the fielder in question
just picks his spot at square-leg before dispatching this short of length with a Calypso clip off the hips

Tamim looked in trouble as soon as this struck in line of the stumps. There was the initial question about inside-edge. Didn't seem keen to review it, which is usually a sign that there was no contact with the bat, but goes for it as he realises the worth of his wicket to Scotland's cause. Doesn't appear to be anything on Snicko. And it is all reds across as Tamim has to go after his fine 95. Poor review which is wasted by Bangladesh, which hopefully won't be an issue as we get into the business end of things
content to just play away this length delivery towards the off side
able to cover the line of this length delivery on the pads
fires one down the leg side as Shakib is late on the flick
another leg-side delivery, this time shaping away from the batsman, as he fails to pick this up
doesn't time this attempted pull through midwicket, getting this away uppishly before landing safe on the ring near midwicket
drives through the off side to pickup a single
eases away a single down to long on as they rotate strike
attacks this flighted delivery outside off as this is worked away to sweeper cover
cut away straight to the fielder at cover as he looked to pick the gap on the off side
turned away off the pads as they run a quick single before the throw at the non-striker's
fails to do anything more than just fend this delivery softly to the leg side
tries to guide this one past point on the off side, but fails to do so
this time jabs away through the covers to get Shakib on strike
carts this length delivery aerially over the covers for a single
looking to bounce this over the fielder at point, but the man is more than equal to the task

This could be a run-out, but Rahim escapes. Short slower ball, Rahim goes early into the pull, the ball rolls towards point off the toe-end of the bat, Rahim takes off for a run, but Shakib says no, Rahim slips while turning back, the fielder has a shy but misses. Rahim crawls back into the crease. He was a goner if it was a direct-hit
safely negotiates the final ball of the over
delivers this flatter delivery on middle and leg as this is helped away through long leg
ends up popping a chance to Machan as he flicks away this floater on middle and leg. Machan has to run hard to his right, but is unable to get his clutches on the ball
follows it up with a rank, wide delivery outside off which is punished by Mushfiqur as he employs the late cut to good use
steered expertly down the ground to the man at long on
looking to find some space on the leg side, but is unable to
guided now through extra-cover as they pair complete a single
able to run this one pitched outside off through the third man region
goes for the drop single outside off as he plays with the most delicate of hands
backs away to the leg side before drilling this fuller one through long off. A misfield by mid-off affords them the opportunity to pinch a second, which they do quite comfortably in the end
slapped away through the covers to find the fielder in the deep
gets on one knee to try and heave this over midwicket, but doesn't quite get all of it as it lands with a couple of bounces before the fielder in the deep
short and given the treatment by Shakib as he places the pull beautifully to find deep midwicket
full and on the leg stump. Mushfiqur taps it to mid-on and sets off for a single
tries to get some bat on this short of a length, leg-side delivery, but is late on it
gets far too early into this attempted pickup shot through fine leg, with the ball ending up near his feet in the end
hammers away this back of a length through square-leg for one
Mushfiqur announces his fifty to the commentary box at the ground as he sends this fuller one right into the window of one of the broadcasting booths at long off
sheer majesty from Mushfiqur as he ramps the quickie high over backward point to just fall short of the rope
Mushfiqur putting on a clinic in how to spread the field as he now targets cow corner with a pull that almost makes it to the rope, but the boundary rider is able to track it back
slow bouncer which is dealt with by Shakib as he pummels this to the deep at midwicket
now content to just glance away this back of a length off the hips for one
short and wide as Mushfiqur has ages to get this one away to extra-cover
looks to go after this shorter one going across, but is late on the delivery
carves away a run through backward point to get off the strike

this could be a pivotal moment in this match as Mushfiqur, looking to blast some quick runs down the ground, ends up getting a bottom-edge which flies high to long on, who is able to settle under it comfortably. A valuable knock, but he will be kicking himself as there is still quite a way to go
fantastic fielding from Majid of his own bowling as he prevents this drive from going past him to long on
defended carefully by the batsman, and that too with soft hands
looks for the single on the leg side, but is unable to take it
locates the man at mid-off with a forceful shot off the back foot
gets in a nice stride before defending this one away
and the plan comes off beautifully as they are able to coax a run out of Sabbir on the leg side, who now has to front up again for the next over
tries in vain to club this short of a length through midwicket, but ends up finding long on
tries to guide one past the man at point, but is unable to do so
almost drags this short of a length outside off onto his stumps, but gets away it

just when he moved the slip out of the place, Sabbir ends up offering an outside edge which probably would have carried to the man had he remained there, but this ends up flying through to the third man boundary
good length delivery, just outside off stump, with Sabbir defending off the front foot
defends this final delivery as we enter into the final ten
gets away the spinner through long on
advances down to ease this delivery to the fielder at long on
able to whip away a run through the leg side to get off the strike
unable to get it past the bowler, who is intent on fielding everything that comes his way
shimmies down the track to guide this to long off for one
goes round the wicket now as Shakib is able to drive him through extra-cover to keep the strike
goes to plan for Bangladesh as Shakib is able to hook away this shorter delivery through long leg
backs away a touch before looking to clobber the bowler over his head at long off, but doesn't quite get it away
slanting down the pads as this is glanced away towards square-leg
far too short for this as he gets slammed high over midwicket for a huge six, much to the merriment of the Bangladeshi contingent in the crowd
able to keep out this fuller one just outside off
content to just fend away this short of a length angling into him from outside off
tossed up outside off stump. Shakib drives it square of the wicket on the off side
floated on and around off as this is defended by Sabbir
very full as Sabbir drills it back to the bowler, who dives to his right and stops the ball

short enough for Sabbir to get after as he pulls powerfully through cow corner to try and get to the boundary. The man, coming from deep midwicket, is able to do just about enough to stop this from reaching the rope
sends a moonshot high over long on as this gets over the boundary quite comfortably. Was a huge hit at 97 meters.
tries to slam Haq through long on, but ends up getting it to the bowler on the bounce as he sticks out his mitts to stop this one in its tracks
reaches out to this full, wide delivery outside of off as they are able to pickup a single
gets nicely behind the line of this fuller length on and around off
full and in the slot as this is square driven to the man in the deep on the boundary
looks to steer this fuller length on and around off through third man, but is unable to do so
another yorker outside off which Shakib is unable to do much with
overpitched and Shakib shellacs this over cow corner to get a 89-metre six. Made a wonderful sound as this connected with leather
able to steal a couple on the leg side as they push the first one hard enough to return for the second in time for the throw
tries to glide one past the keeper, but is late on it
full delivery which is struck straight to the man at short mid-off
full delivery which is eased away to the man at long off
full delivery which he tries to bludgeon away through midwicket, with this going all the way along the carpet to the fielder in the deep
fires in a fantastic yorker which is dug out by the batsman, before Wardlaw gets down to pounce on the incoming drive
length delivery which is carved away towards deep cover
searching for the yorker as he just gets this wrong for Sabbir to get under and flick this away through fine leg for a boundary
low full toss which Sabbir is able to get up and under as he lifts this cleanly over deep extra-cover for another boundary
full again and driven comfortably to the man at long off
waits on this slow yorker before angling the bat to get this away through third man. Also brings up the Bangladesh 300. This is their first instance at a World Cup game.
steers away this fuller one to long on to end a successful over for Bangladesh
picks up a run through extra-cover to get Shakib on strike
looking to flick this fuller one past backward square, but finds him right away
now tries to reach out to this attempted yorker on the blockhole, but is late on the ball
too full and Shakib is able to unearth another vital boundary straight back past the bowler, as his blow beats the dive from long on to the boundary
digs out this fuller one to set off for a quick single, which the pair are able to complete quite comfortably in the end
full delivery on the toes which is clipped down to long on as they are able to steal two runs in the process before the throw
almost halves the chase as he unleashes a drive through the covers which finds its way to the boundary rope. Bangladesh just a bludgeon away now
this time hooks the bowler down to long leg as they are kept to just the one
short ball outside off which is pulled down into the ground, with short mid-on fielding the ball
levels the scores with a push through the covers which has enough legs on it to get to the extra-cover boundary
gets nice and low as he blocks out this fuller one outside of off
short of a length as this is handled with comfort by the batsman, who looks to be giving Shakib a chance to get to his fifty as he is allowed the strike for the next over
and it is a fairytale finish for Shakib, and Bangladesh, as he not only gets to his fifty with a slice over third man, but also secures Bangladesh's highest World Cup run-chase as well
